description:
When challenging an archnemesis to a duel, please make sure they do not mistake it as an invitation to hang out. It’s awkward for everyone involved.
Source: HIDIVE

titles.title: Taiketsu Futatabi! Mahou Shoujo no Arata naru Sugata!?
Yet Another Showdown! The Magical Girl Has a Brand New Appearance?!
対決ふたたび! 魔法少女の新たなる姿!?
